comment.body:
Registered and cannot see where there are moving pictures are supposed to be.
Please elaborate step by step.

Please disable the following filter lists (included in other enabled lists):
```
EasyList Germany
EasyList
AdGuard Cookie Notices
AdGuard Popups
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
AdGuard Other Annoyances
AdGuard Widgets
Fanboy's Social Blocking List
EasyList Cookie List
```

Is it working if you disable all third-party filters and only enable AdGuard filters?

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: Block page appear when I use right click extension on Novelpia.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

I use a extension that forces right click (Absolute Right Click And Copy) but the page redirect the block page at me  

Browser: Firefox

System: Windows 10

Ad-blocker: uBlock Origin

Already enable List KR but done nothing

The web dev usually update the website in half a month or each month. So it is a cat and mouse game.

[https://novelpia.com/viewer/2632853/](url)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1c959ad7-8548-44e4-909f-879d68c04493)

Cannot see the code script by entering web developing mode cause that will redirect me to the block page

But here is the code script from uBlock Origin though:

issue.title: telecome.cn
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.zhihu.android&hl=zh&pli=1

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

In China, domain names need to be registered. Then I checked this domain name and found that it belongs to an advertising company in Beijing. So my suggestion is to ban this domain name。telecome.cn should be banned directly

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7b4bee1f-6304-4f96-9182-7569b0c82810)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/82f10e58-54c4-4991-ba39-74573b3fed7b)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

review.body:
Also block it using the network rule.
```adblock
||porncoven.com/files/aichat.gif
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://youla.ru/all/remont-i-stroitelstvo?attributes%5Bsort_field%5D=date_published](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoula.ru%2Fall%2Fremont-i-stroitelstvo%3Fattributes%255Bsort_field%255D%3Ddate_published) ### Comment > При включенной фильтрации только на этом сайте если включить сортировку по новизне, в любом из разделов при пролистывании страницы вниз страница сама начинает прокручиваться вверх и вниз, такое происходит только если включена сортировка по новизне. Эта проблема уже около полугода (как то была ранее и я создавал обращение в тех. поддержку и её исправляли, но она вернулась через несколько лет). Если отключить фильтрацию на 30 сек. и прокрутить страничку до первой подгрузки новых объявлений то страничка прокручивается нормально и по истечении 30 сек подгрузка рекламных миниатюр вместо иконок объявлений прекращается (то есть всё работает как положено, до обновления странички например по F5 или перехода в другую категорию объявлений и выборе сортировки по новизне). Очень надеюсь что в следующем релизе это исправят так как ждать устал и написал обращение. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/900gyo4o2eosgcg8wwcgsw4k4c4wo4oblmwgg6xbz4.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

reashu.com##.box-content > strong:has(> div.center > a#konowaka.btn-orange[style][href^="https://px.a8.net/"])

reashu.com##.say.right:has(> div.chatting > div.sc > p > strong > #h2_ue_ad1[href^="https://px.a8.net/"])

but the difference is only that you fouces on img while me button, either will be fine. I think 6 of `.say.right` having a8 links can also be hidden contextually.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://jetswap.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fjetswap.com) ### Comment > при выключенной защите, или если программа не добавлена в список > фильтруемых приложений, сайты загружаются, в конце в строке состояния > вверху видим показ засчитан. > дальше захожу в редактор dns фильтров, добавляю строки > `@@||jetswap.com^` > `@@||jetswap.net^` > для разблокировки. через браузерный помощник отключаю защиту на тех же > доменах. > в разделе фильтруемые приложения добавляю приложение SafeSurf. > защита работает, запускаю автосёрфинг. сайты загружаются, правда часто > ругается на сертификат. это никак не исправить, ибо сертификаты у них на > сервере, а не у клиента. ваш сертификат они не внесут в базу по понятным > причинам. главное не это. после окончания времени просмотра сайта в > строке состояния, вместо показ засчитан написано выключите блокировку > рекламы. можно ли это как-то исправить? раньше помогало добавление двух > выше указанных доменов Jetswap com и net в исключения, теперь это не > работает. видимо что-то исправили в последнем крупном обновлении. > возможно установили какой-то счётчик, который не загружается. > самостоятельно найти причину не могу. > сама: > http://dl.jetswap.net:8080/j/safesurf-install2.exe > логин для входа: egor2145 > пароль: `UyAtBEciQqy^ZV#2sBXV%)69M!7#uQQ73br1Z#!p#f2i@h8rER` > если будет нужна дополнительная информация, по возможности предоставлю Username: `@ihurin` ### Screenshots

pull_request.title: Fix reports.adguard.app
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://reports.adguard.app/en/new_issue.html

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

1. Your comment

Block self-promo on https://reports.adguard.app/en/new_issue.html

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/eec37ed0-1908-422f-930c-58bbb9db126a)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

Hello. Seems work fine on my end. Please, try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window 30–60 seconds.
Also, you can contact our technical support for help in setting up the application: support@adguard.com
